Description: Links (Home, Cart, Help) lead to correct pages.
Expected outcome: Expected pages are open when links are clicked.

Description: Clicking (all) checkbox selects or deselects all in that category.
Only one category can be selected for “By date uploaded” category
Expected outcome: Radio buttons allow to select only one category for this special category.

Description: Correct link is created when only some values are selected
Expected outcome: When a user clicks “Apply filters” correct page is displayed. Try applying selections in several categories.

Description: Entering a search term and hitting enter leads to correct page
Expected outcome: When a user enters a search term, for instace, '6d7*' (without quotes) it goes to correct page: '/search/?q=6d7*' in that case.

Description: No search results when nothing is found
Expected outcome: A message is displayed when no results are found: “No results found.”

Description: Results are paginated if more than 10
Expected outcome: If more than 10 results are returned, they are grouped in groups of 10.

Description: Total number of results is shown
Expected outcome: A page with results has a message “Found 18 results”

Description: Filtering is shown
Expected outcome: On search results page a message about used filters is shown. For example: “Filtered by center: (BCM OR BI).”

Description: Page navigation links work
Expected outcome: Links “Prev”, “Next”, 1, 2, etc. lead to correct search results pages.

Description: First and last pages are shown as links in paging navigation.
Expected outcome: These links may be followed and correct pages are reached.

Description: Sorting is done by clicking table headlines
Expected outcome: When a user clicks table headers sorting is made and sorting order is displayed. When the link is clicked again, the order is reversed and new order is displayed.

Description: Items from search results may be added to cart by selecting checkboxes
Expected outcome: When “Add to cart” button is clicked, items for which checkboxes were selected are added to cart. User is directed to the cart page.

Description: Select all checkbox selects all items
Expected outcome: The checkbox in the header of the table when checked checks all other checkboxes on the page. When one unchecks it, every other checkbox becomes unchecked. When it is checked and one of other checkboxes is unchecked it also becomes unchecked.

Description: Cart statistics on cart page
Expected outcome: There is information on cart page: number of files there and total size of the files.

Description: Number of files in the cart is shown in Cart navigation link
Expected outcome: For instance, “Cart (3)”

Description: Items may be removed from the cart
Expected outcome: When checkboxes are checked on the cart page and “Remove from cart” button is clicked, the corresponding items are removed from the cart.

Description: Select all checkbox works the same way as in search results
Expected outcome: see CART-2

Description: Headers may sort cart content
Expected outcome: When clicking cart table headers the table content  is sorted correspondingly See SEARCH-7

Description: Manifest may be downloaded
Expected outcome: When button “Download Manifest” is clicked, manifest for all items in the cart is downloaded.

Description: XML may be downloaded
Expected outcome: Similar to CART-8, but full XML information is downloaded, when button “Download XML” is clicked.
